syllabus:
**Advanced Writing**

Department of English, NTNU, Fall 2022

**_Course description_**

The main purpose of the course is to expand and strengthen students’ abilities to read, reflect and write critically about different topics. Through working with different kind of texts students are encouraged to combine close reading and critical thinking into short essays that reflect their understanding and insightful perspective on various aspects of contemporary culture. 

**_Required readings_**

*   Course pack (CP)
*   Handouts & Articles on Moodle [http://moodle.ntnu.edu.tw/](http://moodle.ntnu.edu.tw/) (M)

**_Course requirements_**

Students will be graded on the basis of their essays & their revisions 70% and (2) in class participation and peer-reviewing 30%. Students are expected to be familiar with the required readings _prior to_ the class discussion and be prepared to give _considered_ response and _talk_ in class.
